fi.tamk.tiko.engine.system.save

Class SaveManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.tamk.tiko.engine.system.save.SaveManager

  • public abstract class SaveManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which can handle saving and loading data from persistent storage. Class can write and load SaveObjects from given location. Default directory is set to root/save but it can be changed.
    Since:
    1.8
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jani Timonen

      • loadFromFime

        public java.lang.String[][] loadFromFime(java.lang.String filename)
        Loads given filename from default directory. Loads file and returns values in two dimensional String array.
        Parameters:
        filename - name of file.
        Returns:
        saved values in two dimensional String array.
